title: Login Issues - Can't Access Account
description: Customer is unable to log in to their account. They've tried resetting their password multiple times but still cannot access.

title: Payment Failed - Order Not Processed
description: User reports that their payment failed despite entering correct card details. No confirmation email received.

title: App Crashes on Startup
description: Customer reports that the app immediately crashes when opened on Android 13 devices.

title: Unable to Reset Password
description: User successfully reset password after support team guidance.

title: Website Not Loading on Safari
description: Customer reports that the website does not load properly on Safari browser version 16.3.

title: Incorrect Billing Amount
description: Customer was charged twice for the same subscription plan. Needs immediate refund.

title: Two-Factor Authentication Not Working
description: Customer unable to receive verification code via SMS for 2FA login.

title: Missing Order Confirmation Email
description: Customer did not receive confirmation email but order was processed successfully.

title: Slow Website Performance
description: Website taking too long to load for users in Europe. Reported by multiple customers.

title: Mobile App - Notification Delay
description: Notifications are delayed by several minutes on iOS devices.

title: Refund Request
description: Customer paid twice due to technical glitch and requests refund confirmation.

title: Cannot Update Profile Picture
description: Customer was unable to update their profile image but issue resolved after cache clearing.
